title: New: A. G. Cook – Beautiful
content: With the world finally catching on to the genius that is that PC Music family, and hordes of articles cropping up lauding their output, alongside questioning the longevity of such a project, it’s only a matter of time before one of their artists stumbles upon a mainstream break through. Of those most likely to, producer and PC kingpin A. G. Cook seems perhaps the most capable of doing so, and latest track, Beautiful, is a glorious crossover between early 00’s happy hardcore, and sugary sweet bubblegum pop, that somehow, just works. Check it out.
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d27
